#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long int a[500002], sum = 0, j = 0, n, ways = 0, c = 0;
	cin >> n;
	
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		cin >> a[i];
		sum += a[i];
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {
		j += a[i];
		if (j * 3 == (2 * sum)) {
			ways += c;
		}
		if (j* 3 == sum) {
			c++;
		}
	}
	cout << ways << endl;
	return 0;
}
